quests.desc: You are now playing a exciting episode of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First, it would be great if you could make it so that the chest in the bar is unlocked. After that, open the chest inside the bar. And then, take the non-euclidean latchkey from the chest. After getting the non-euclidean latchkey, make an effort to venture west. Then, insert the non-euclidean latchkey into the non-euclidean chest's lock to unlock it. Once you have unlocked the non-euclidean chest, ensure that the non-euclidean chest is open. After pulling open the non-euclidean chest, retrieve the passkey from the non-euclidean chest inside the pantry. After that, try to head east. And then, check that the door is unlocked with the passkey. And then, make sure that the door in the bar is ajar. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
commands: unlock non-euclidean chest with non-euclidean latchkey
unlock non-euclidean chest with non-euclidean latchkey

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You make a grand eccentric entrance into a bar. The room is well lit.

 You make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest in the corner.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The chest is empty![end if] You can see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] ordinary looking box nearby.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The box contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The box is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] What a letdown! The non-euclidean chest is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

walkthrough: unlock non-euclidean chest with non-euclidean latchkey

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! First thing I need you to do is to unlock the chest inside the bar with the key. After that, assure that the chest in the bar is wide open. After opening the chest, recover the non-euclidean latchkey from the chest inside the bar. And then, travel west. Following that, check that the non-euclidean chest is unlocked with the non-euclidean latchkey. And then, ensure that the non-euclidean chest in the pantry is open. Then, pick up the passkey from the non-euclidean chest within the pantry. After that, go to the east. And then, check that the door inside the bar is unlocked with the passkey. Then, ensure that the door inside the bar is open. Got that? Good!
